snippets: NSAIDs such as ibuprofen increase the risk of gastrointestinal bleeding and may potentiate anticoagulant effect when combined with warfarin; avoid combination or monitor closely with gastro‑protection. (BNF Interactions warfarin, accessed 20 Jun 2025)
Paracetamol (≤4 g/day) is preferred for analgesia in patients on warfarin. (NICE Anticoagulation decision aid, 2024)
